name: Restaurant on Main
description: A local favorite serving Southern comfort food with a modern twist, open for breakfast, lunch, and dinner.

name: Coffee Factory
description: Specialty coffee shop known for small-batch roasts, artisan pastries, and a cozy work-friendly atmosphere.

name: Vita Juice
description: Fresh juice bar offering organic smoothies, detox blends, and plant-based snacks for a healthier lifestyle.

name: Tech Solutions
description: Professional IT services company providing business networking, cybersecurity, and software development.

description: Reliable handyman services specializing in home repairs, installations, and seasonal maintenance.

description: Licensed general contractors offering residential remodeling, roofing, and new construction services.

name: Sally's Beauty Boutique
description: Chic full-service salon providing hair styling, nails, facials, and makeup for all occasions.
